mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT cr.user_id as userId, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userAvatar, MAX(cr.create_time) as lastMessageTime, (SELECT content FROM chat_record cr2 WHERE cr2.user_id = cr.user_id AND cr2.hotel_id = #{hotelId} ORDER BY cr2.create_time DESC LIMIT 1) as lastMessage FROM chat_record cr LEFT JOIN student_info ui ON cr.user_id = ui.id WHERE cr.hotel_id = #{hotelId} GROUP BY cr.user_id, ui.name, ui.avatar ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC

SELECT DISTINCT cr.hotel_id as hotelId, hi.name as hotelName, hi.images as hotelImage, MAX(cr.create_time) as lastMessageTime, (SELECT content FROM chat_record cr2 WHERE cr2.hotel_id = cr.hotel_id AND cr2.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cr2.create_time DESC LIMIT 1) as lastMessage FROM chat_record cr LEFT JOIN teacher_info hi ON cr.hotel_id = hi.id WHERE cr.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY cr.hotel_id, hi.name, hi.images ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC
